nodes.text: Genetics Laboratory G-1 was a secret science facility located on the planet of Manaan during the Cold War. It was under control of the Revanites, who experimented on living beings to advance their own goals. The facility was overseen by the Selkath scientist Gorima.

At some point during the Galactic War, Gorima experimented on numerous living specimens, including the Wookiee Jakarro. The latter was later freed by a combined Republic/Empire strike team, which infiltrated the base. During the infiltration, Arkous and Colonel Darok fled the facility and launched a deep charge at it, sinking the Laboratory.
